revised_title: Multivariate Analysis in the Genetics of Spermatozoan Dimensions in Mice
tldr: The authors conducted a study on inbred strains of mice to analyze the dimensions of their spermatozoa using multivariate statistical methods. They found that it is possible to differentiate between strains using a combination of four spermatozoan characteristics. The study also demonstrated the usefulness of multivariate analysis in understanding the genetics of spermatozoan dimensions and potential applications in the future.
